channel.title: Trade Glitch [Help!]
channel.description:
Ok my name is SeaScape and I have noticed when you trade on my source it turns anything into varrock armor 3, I searched all through my client.java couldn't find the code? Im not sure if i missed it but could someone explain further how to fix this problem?
I have a FunScap3 Source {Remix} By Me. I have doped it up :) Umm yeah people are gettin angry that when they put stuff in it turns to varrock armor :( So if you could help me you would be a bloody Legend.
Thanks,

item.title: Trade Glitch [Help!]
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

Yeah but it happens to like all Clients its somewhere in the client.Java i think but i can’t find where it is. If anyone knows where this glitch is please help me out!!

I Have to use Silabs because I Have skillcapes etc. Varrock Armor 3 appears in trade when you try to put any item in :S

Read full topic
